Description:
     Five years after the events of the first game, Jackie Estacado is the head of the syndicate, who struggles with his ability. Since that time, Jackie has grown to the position of a mafia boss and got into a full-scale war between gangsters - so his "dark" abilities will be very helpful. A cult called "The Brotherhood", decides to capture her. Jackie confronts them. The main character will also fall into another reality, which is a psychiatric hospital (in which all the characters in the game are either employees of the hospital or by the patients themselves), giving a hint that maybe Jackie paranoid schizophrenic, but the hero who freed mignon breaks the stereotype.
Features:
" Boundless strength - better and use the power of darkness for an even more dynamic gameplay. 
" Unforgettable experience - feel zahvatavyvaschy scenario of Darkness, written by Paul Jenkins, to whom we owe such projects as The Incredible Hulk, Wolverine, and the original Darkness game. 
" An amazing graphical style - Shadows in the colorful style of illustrating comics and color combined with the dramatic lighting in the film noir style, enliven the pages of comic books.
